message.body: Someone on the subway this morning vaguely smelled like you and I just needed to share that because I miss your smell sooo much.
Was not expecting that but thanks! Miss u 2. How was your break? Sorry I couldn't see you guys
Haha yeah I realize that could come off as very creepy. Our break was really wonderful (but if we had seen you it woulda been betta)
(‚ù§) Who did you see and what did you doooo

Well we went to Sasha's thing so I saw Ilya Nick Rocio Sasha and Julia. Nick made us watch a really bad movie. Jordan and I also had dinner with my grandfather. Idk. We spent a lotta time together and that was really nice. What were you up to?

Sounds like you're a little unsatisfied...? My thanksgiving was good, I got to see my family and baby cousins and sleep in my own bed. It was nice to be home but I kinda felt like just a visitor. Ill have a chance to settle back in in December

No Jordan and I had a really great time together actually. He felt like a visitor too. The best was we were by tech on Wednesday and all the stoop kids had returned and then we walked by connecticut muffin and Daniel was standing there and Nick and I died cus Jordan can't run away
Daniels always present
Lmaoooooo. Fuckin Daniel. That's good though. How is everything at tech these days
Bad. Lol. Idk - nothing new. Pretty blah. Parent teacher conferences are tomorrow and my mom was like we are going and I was like we don't need to but oh well. What's new at Emory?
Yeah my parents didn't go senior year. Finals are happening soon and so much writing needs to be done ahhhhh. But in three weeks I'm back home so it's not so bad. Ill get through it.
You totally will! I'm like chill who cares but oh well.
Yeah word. Your grades are pristine no doubt. So I heard they changed it so there's only four marking periods?
Yep. That's why parent teachers are now. And actually this year they've dropped. Like a point. Lol not a big deal
Yeah you will be fine. That's so weird. Why change something that's not a problem? Ugh. Tech. Are you applying anywhere for regular decision in addition to Cornell
Huh? Why would I only apply RD to Cornell?
I thought you applied to Cornell early?
No I applied early to Stanford but its a secret
OH yes that's where it was. I didn't tell anyone
It musta been sooo hard
Yeah def especially since I actually remembered the school you applied to
Did rowley come to class drunk ever?
LOL no I don't think so. At least I didn't know it. Did she come in drunk today??
Definitely hungover I'd guess
Oh yeah probably hungover. But then again she's kinda naturally crabby
She smelled like alcohol and was super disheveled
Oh that's awks. She's a bit troubled
Yeahhh
